author: mich@girlracer.me.uk (Michelle Chenery)
title: Incredible Pixel Group expands team
text:
Incredible Pixel Group expands team Incredible Pixel Group expands team Details Category: Appointments   11:30 Leading AV and digital solutions specialist Incredible Pixel Group (IPG) has announced the appointment of Benjamin Hook as Project Support Technician and Joseph Smyth as Project Manager, following the company’s recent expansion. 
Based at the company’s new premises and extensive warehouse facility in Harlow, Essex, Joseph Smyth will provide specialist product support and production for conferences and events, having previously worked as an AV Co-ordinator for Siemens at its flagship building, The Crystal, while Benjamin Hook strengthens IPG’s technical team and brings specific expertise in outdoor LED and equipment management.Prior to joining IPG, Benjamin previously worked for events crewing company Gallowglass where he gained significant industry experience and several qualifications, including becoming CSCS Accredited. Darren Poultney, Managing Director of Smart AV and Founder of IPG, says: “A strong technical team is the backbone of our success and we are delighted to have Joseph and Benjamin on board. This is an exciting time at IPG as we continue to expand and we’re delighted to be strengthening our team at a key point in the company’s development.” Related articles
